remarks: Dependent Choice.  Axiom DC1 of [Schechter] p. 149, with the addition of an initial value ` C ` .  This theorem is weaker than the Axiom of Choice but is stronger than Countable Choice.  It shows the existence of a sequence whose values can only be shown to exist (but cannot be constructed explicitly) and also depend on earlier values in the sequence.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Jan-2013.)
